cause.description:
Seriously, penguins should be left at being seal/shark/killer whale foodstuffs and not for our entertainment purposes.
Have you ever tried to teach a penguin to dance? You just waste your time and upset the penguin.
1. Ban all dancing penguin references
cause.mission: Penguins should not dance. It is against nature and their own rights.
cause.name: Make Penguin Dancing Immoral
